name: AnarchyField: Infinite Euphoric Level Destruction
description:
AnarchyField: Infinite Euphoric Level Destruction is a revolutionary game with a focus on destruction and physics. AnarchyField is a breath of fresh air in the modern gaming industry which lacks and even detests innovation.

You get to be a vehicle or a plane in a small city where you can destroy buildings. This is a shooter where all your dreams about destructible world come true. Only a handful of games would allow you to interact with a destructible world like AnarchyField does.

Now it even has multiplayer! What are you waiting for?



Current features
  • A small destructible city
  • Jet fighters
  • Cars
  • Multiplayer
  • An early look into a sandbox destructible world.

Features coming soon
  • Bigger city maps to destroy
  • More vehicles and content

Jump in to support early access if you seek destruction.
